Html:
I'm on the 15FEB09 Alpha Release.  I want to export my posts and comments, but when I go to manage site it says exporting is "coming soon".

What's the easiest way I can export my content to move to another platform?

Yah, sadly, we never got to that one.  You could use the BlogML code for import to build your own export (just the opposite).  The other thought is to just write SQL statements (if you're going to something else that uses SQL).  Just curious, what are you switching to?
